entry.title: Hello World!
entry.content:
This is fun. I just learned how to use git and now I’m trying to learn markdown. I’m totally new to all this and I pretty much have no clue what I’m doing. Surprisingly, Google and following directions will go a long way with how well some things are documented.

Okay now I’m going to insert a picture

Check it out!

I still have lots to learn – like Markdown and some Ruby if I want to make changes to how I use Octopress. But this is pretty fun!
